name: sniper/mobiledevice
description: Adds [ Post made via Mobile Device ] with posted message when user posts from a mobile device. Displays welcome mobile user message on index. Displays user's mobile image in header navbar on all other pages. Displays user is Logged in on mobile in topic and profile pages. Link in header navbar for mobile logs popup. Mobile log user agents can be used to add new mobile devices to your list. ACP switches for all mobile displays and logs. UCP switches for user's display preferences.
